   19: %%
   20: -module(zlc_cover_SUITE).
   21: 
   22: -export([all/0, suite/0, groups/0, init_per_suite/1, end_per_suite/1,
   23:          init_per_group/2,end_per_group/2,
   24:          init_per_testcase/2,end_per_testcase/2,
   25:          basic/1,mixed_zlc/1,zmc/1,filter_guard/1,
   26:          filter_pattern/1,cartesian/1,nomatch/1,bad_generators/1,
   27:          strict_list/1,strict_binary/1]).
   28: 
   29: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   30: -include_lib("stdlib/include/assert.hrl").
   31: 
   32: suite() ->
   33:     [{ct_hooks,[ts_install_cth]},
   34:      {timetrap,{minutes,1}}].
   35: 
   36: all() ->
   37:     [{group,p}].
   38: 
   39: groups() ->
   40:     [{p,test_lib:parallel(),
   41:       [basic,
   42:        mixed_zlc,
   43:        zmc,
   44:        filter_guard,
   45:        filter_pattern,
   46:        cartesian,
   47:        nomatch,
   48:        bad_generators,
   49:        strict_list,
   50:        strict_binary
   51:       ]}].
   52: 
   53: init_per_suite(Config) ->
   54:     test_lib:recompile(?MODULE),
   55:     Config.
   56: 
   57: end_per_suite(_Config) ->
   58:     ok.
   59: 
   60: init_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
   61:     Config.
   62: 
   63: end_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
   64:     Config.
   65: 
   66: 
   67: init_per_testcase(Case, Config) when is_atom(Case), is_list(Config) ->
   68:     Config.
   69: 
   70: end_per_testcase(Case, Config) when is_atom(Case), is_list(Config) ->
   71:     ok.
   72: 
   73: basic(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
   74:     [6, 7, 8] = [X + Y + Z || X <- [1, 2, 3] && Y <- [2, 2, 2] && Z <- [3,3,3]],
   75:     [{1, 2, 3}, {2, 2, 3}, {3, 2, 3}] =
   76:         [{X, Y, Z} || X <- [1, 2, 3] && Y <- [2, 2, 2] && Z <- [3,3,3]],
   77:     [6, 24] = zipwith4(fun(A, B, C, D) -> (A + B + C) * D end,
   78:                        [1, 5], [2, 2], [0, 1], [2, 3]),
   79:     96 = dot([1, 2, 3, 4], [24, 12, 8, 6]),
   80: 
   81:     [1, 4, 5] = ifelse([true, false, true], [1, 3, 5], [2, 4, 6]),
   82: 
   83:     [8, 14, 20] = [X + Y + Z || <<X>> <= <<5, 10, 15>> && <<Y>> <= <<1, 2, 3>>
   84:                                     && <<Z>> <= <<2, 2, 2>>].
   85: 
   86: 
   87: zipwith4(F, As, Bs, Cs, Ds) ->
   88:     [F(A,B,C,D) || A <- As && B <- Bs && C <- Cs && D <- Ds].
   89: 
   90: dot(Xs, Ys) ->
   91:     lists:sum([X*Y || X <- Xs && Y <- Ys]).
   92: 
   93: ifelse(Tests, Xs, Ys) ->
   94:     %% Simulate R's ifelse(,,)
   95:     [case T of
   96:          true -> X;
   97:          false -> Y
   98:      end || T <- Tests && X <- Xs && Y <- Ys
   99:     ].
  100: 
  101: mixed_zlc(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  102:     [{a, 2}, {b, 4}, {c, 6}] = [{X,Y} || X <- [a,b,c] && <<Y>> <= <<2,4,6>>],
  103:     [{a, 2}, {b, 4}, {c, 6}] = [{X,Y} || <<Y>> <= <<2,4,6>> && X <- [a,b,c]],
  104:     [{a,c,1,3}, {b,d,2,4}] = [{K1,K2,V1,V2}||
  105:                                  K1 := V1 <- maps:iterator(#{a=>1, b=>2}, ordered) &&
  106:                                      K2 := V2 <- maps:iterator(#{c=>3, d=>4}, ordered)],
  107:     [{a,1,2}, {b,2,4}] =
  108:         [{K1,V1,Y} || K1 := V1 <- maps:iterator(#{a=>1, b=>2}, ordered) &&
  109:                           <<Y>> <= <<2,4>>],
  110:     [{a,1,2}, {b,2,4}] = [{K1,V1,Y} ||
  111:                              K1 := V1 <- maps:iterator(#{a=>1, b=>2}, ordered) &&
  112:                                  <<Y>> <= <<2,4>>],
  113:     <<3,4,5>> = << <<(X+Y)/integer>> || X <- [1,2,3] && Y <- [2,2,2]>>,
  114:     <<3,4,5>> = << <<(X+V1)/integer>> ||
  115:                     X <- [1,2,3] &&
  116:                         _K1 := V1 <- maps:iterator(#{a=>2, b=>2, c=>2}, ordered)>>,
  117:     <<3,4,5>> = << <<(X+V1)/integer>> ||
  118:                     <<X>> <= <<1,2,3>> &&
  119:                         _K1 := V1 <- maps:iterator(#{a=>2, b=>2, c=>2}, ordered)>>,
  120:     <<3,4,5>> = << <<(V1+V2)/integer>> ||
  121:                     _K1 := V1 <- maps:iterator(#{a=>1, b=>2, c=>3}, ordered) &&
  122:                         _K2 := V2 <- maps:iterator(#{a=>2, b=>2, c=>2}, ordered)>>,
  123:     #{c := 3,b := 2,a := 1} = #{X => Y || X <- [a,b,c] && Y <- [1,2,3]},
  124:     #{c := 3,b := 2,a := 1} = #{X => Y || X <- [a,b,c] && <<Y>> <= <<1,2,3>>},
  125:     ok.
  126: 
  127: zmc(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  128:     [{a,b,1,3}] = [{K1, K2, V1, V2} || K1 := V1 <- #{a=>1} && K2 := V2 <- #{b=>3}],
  129:     Seq = lists:seq(1, 50),
  130:     M1 = maps:iterator(#{X=>X || X <- Seq}, ordered),
  131:     M2 = maps:iterator(#{X=>X || X <- lists:seq(1,50)}, ordered),
  132:     true = [A * 4 || A <- Seq] =:=
  133:         [X+Y+Z+W || X := Y <- M1 && Z := W <- M2],
  134:     true = << <<(A * 4):64>> || A <- Seq>> =:=
  135:         << <<(X+Y+Z+W):64>> || X := Y <- M1 && Z := W <- M2>>,
  136: 
  137:     M3 = maps:iterator(#{X=>X*3 || X <- Seq}, ordered),
  138:     M4 = maps:iterator(#{X*2=>X*4 || X <- Seq}, ordered),
  139:     true = [{A, A*3, A*2, A*4} || A <- Seq] =:=
  140:         [{X, Y, Z, W} || X := Y <- M3 && Z := W <- M4],
  141:     true = [A * 3 || A <- Seq] =:= [X+Y+Z || X := Y <- M1 && Z <- Seq],
  142:     true = << <<A:64, (A*3):64, (A*2):64, (A*4):64>> || A <- Seq>> =:=
  143:         << <<X:64, Y:64, Z:64, W:64>> || X := Y <- M3 && Z := W <- M4>>,
  144:     true = << <<(A*3):64>> || A <- Seq>> =:=
  145:         << <<(X+Y+Z):64>> || X := Y <- M1 && Z <- Seq>>,
  146: 
  147:     M5 = maps:iterator(#{X =>
  148:                              case X rem 2 of
  149:                                  0 -> {ok,X};
  150:                                  1 -> {error,X}
  151:                              end || X <- Seq}, ordered),
  152:     M6 = maps:iterator(#{X*2 => X*4 || X <- Seq}, ordered),
  153:     [] = [X || {{X,{ok,X}}, {_,X}} <- lists:zip(maps:to_list(M5), maps:to_list(M6))],
  154:     [] = [X || X := {ok,X} <- M5 && _ := X <- M6],
  155:     [] = [X || X := {e,X} <- M5 && X := {ok,X} <- M5],
  156:     ok.
  157: 
  158: filter_guard(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  159:     [[1,2,1]] = [X++Y || X <- [[1,2], [2,-3]] && Y <- [[1], [2]], lists:sum(X)>0],
  160:     [{a,2}, {b,4}, {c,6}] = [{X,Y} || X <- [a,b,c] && <<Y>> <= <<2,4,6>>,
  161:                                       Y rem 2 == 0],
  162:     [{b,4}, {c,6}] = [{X, Y} || X <- [a,b,c] && <<Y>> <= <<2,4,6>>, Y =/= 2],
  163:     [] = [{X,Y} || X <- [a, b, c] && <<Y>> <= <<2,4,6>>, Y rem 2 == 1],
  164:     [{b,4}] = [{X,Y} || <<Y>> <= <<2,4,6>> && X <- [a,b,c], X>a, X<c],
  165:     [{b,d,2}] = [{K1,K2,V1} || K1 := V1 <- maps:iterator(#{a=>1, b=>2}, ordered) &&
  166:                                    K2 := V2 <- maps:iterator(#{c=>3, d=>4}, ordered),
  167:                                V2 rem 2 == 0],
  168:     <<5>> = << <<(X+Y)/integer>> || X <- [1,2,3] && Y <- [2,2,2], X rem 2 == 1, X+Y>4>>,
  169:     #{c := 3,a := 1} = #{X => Y || X <- [a,b,c] && Y <- [1,2,3], Y rem 2 == 1},
  170:     #{c := 3} = #{X => Y || X <- [a,b,c] && Y <- [1,2,3], Y rem 2 == 1, Y > 1},
  171:     #{c := 3,a := 1} = #{X => Y || X <- [a,b,c] && <<Y>> <= <<1,2,3>>, Y rem 2 == 1}.
  172: 
  173: filter_pattern(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  174:     [] = do_filter_pat_1([], []),
  175:     [] = do_filter_pat_1([a], [a]),
  176:     [] = do_filter_pat_1([{ok,a}], [{error,e}]),
  177: 
  178:     [] = do_filter_pat_2([], []),
  179:     [] = do_filter_pat_2([a], [b]),
  180:     [] = do_filter_pat_2([{a,1}], [{b,1}]),
  181:     [{1,7}] = do_filter_pat_2([{a,1}], [{a,7}]),
  182:     [{1,7},{10,20}] = do_filter_pat_2([{a,1},{b,9},{x,10}],
  183:                                       [{a,7},{wrong,8},{x,20}]),
  184: 
  185:     ok.
  186: 
  187: do_filter_pat_1(L1, L2) ->
  188:     Res = [{A,B} || {ok,A} <- L1 && {ok,B} <- L2],
  189:     Res = [{A,B} || {{ok,A},{ok,B}} <- lists:zip(L1,L2)],
  190:     Res.
  191: 
  192: do_filter_pat_2(L1, L2) ->
  193:     Res = [{A,B} || {Same,A} <- L1 && {Same,B} <- L2],
  194:     Res = [{A,B} || {{Same,A},{Same,B}} <- lists:zip(L1,L2)],
  195:     Res.
  196: 
  197: cartesian(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  198:     [{a,3}, {b,5}, {c,7}, {a,4}, {b,6}, {c,8}] =
  199:         [{X, W+Y} || W <- [1,2],
  200:                      X <- [a,b,c] && <<Y>> <= <<2,4,6>>],
  201:     [{a,3}, {a,4}, {b,5}, {b,6}, {c,7}, {c,8}] =
  202:         [{X, W+Y} || X <- [a,b,c] &&
  203:                          <<Y>> <= <<2,4,6>>, W <- [1,2]],
  204:     [{a,4}, {b,6}, {c,8}] =
  205:         [{X, W+Y} || X <- [a,b,c] &&
  206:                          <<Y>> <= <<2,4,6>>, W <- [1,2], (W + Y) rem 2 == 0],
  207:     <<4,2,5,3,6,4>> = << <<(X+V1+Y)/integer>> ||
  208:                           X <- [1,2,3] &&
  209:                               _K1 := V1 <- maps:iterator(#{a=>2, b=>2, c=>2}, ordered),
  210:                           <<Y>> <= <<1,-1>> >>,
  211:     ok.
  212: 
  213: strict_list(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  214:     Seq100 = lists:seq(1, 100),
  215: 
  216:     [2,3,4] = [X+Y || X <:- [1,2,3] && Y <- [1,1,1]],
  217:     [3,4] = [X+Y || X <:- [1,2,3] && Y <:- [1,1,1], X > 1],
  218: 
  219:     [] = strict_list_mixed_1([], []),
  220:     [11,22] = strict_list_mixed_1([{i,1},{i,2}], [{i,10},{i,20}]),
  221:     [13,25] = strict_list_mixed_1([{i,3},{i,4},{i,5}], [{i,10},bad,{i,20}]),
  222:     {'EXIT',{{bad_generators,{[bad,{i,5}],[{i,15},{i,20}]}},_}} =
  223:         catch strict_list_mixed_1([{i,3},bad,{i,5}], [{i,10},{i,15},{i,20}]),
  224:     {'EXIT',{{bad_generators,{[{i,5}],[]}},_}} =
  225:         catch strict_list_mixed_1([{i,3},{i,5}], [bad]),
  226: 
  227:     [] = strict_list_mixed_2([], #{}),
  228:     [15] = strict_list_mixed_2([{i,3}], #{{k,4} => {v,3}}),
  229:     [15] = strict_list_mixed_2([{i,0},{i,3}], #{{a,0} => {a,0},
  230:                                                 {k,4} => {v,3}}),
  231: 
  232:     ?assertEqual([I * 3*I + 7*I || I <- Seq100],
  233:                  strict_list_mixed_2([{i,I} || I <- Seq100],
  234:                                      #{{k,3*I} => {v,7*I} || I <- Seq100})),
  235:     SimpleMap = #{{k,1} => {v,2}},
  236:     {'EXIT',{{bad_generators,{[{a,3}],{{k,1},{v,2},none}}},_}} =
  237:         catch strict_list_mixed_2([{a,3}], SimpleMap),
  238:     {'EXIT',{{bad_generators,{[],{{k,1},{v,2},none}}},_}} =
  239:         catch strict_list_mixed_2([], SimpleMap),
  240: 
  241:     [] = strict_list_strict_1([], []),
  242:     [11,22] = strict_list_strict_1([{i,1},{i,2}], [{i,10},{i,20}]),
  243:     {'EXIT',{{bad_generators,{[bad,{i,5}],[{i,15},{i,20}]}},_}} =
  244:         catch strict_list_strict_1([{i,3},bad,{i,5}], [{i,10},{i,15},{i,20}]),
  245:     {'EXIT',{{bad_generators,{[{i,4},{i,5}],[{wrong_tag,7},{i,20}]}},_}} =
  246:         catch strict_list_strict_1([{i,3},{i,4},{i,5}], [{i,10},{wrong_tag,7},{i,20}]),
  247:     {'EXIT',{{bad_generators,{[{a,b,c},{i,5}],[{wrong_tag,7},{i,20}]}},_}} =
  248:         catch strict_list_strict_1([{i,3},{a,b,c},{i,5}], [{i,10},{wrong_tag,7},{i,20}]),
  249:     {'EXIT',{{bad_generators,{[{i,5}],[]}},_}} =
  250:         catch strict_list_strict_1([{i,3},{i,5}], [{i,7}]),
  251: 
  252:     [] = strict_list_strict_2([], [], <<>>),
  253:     [5,23] = strict_list_strict_2([{i,1},{i,2}], [{i,2},{i,7}], <<3,9>>),
  254:     ?assertEqual([2*I * 3*I + I || I <- Seq100],
  255:                  strict_list_strict_2([{i,2*I} || I <- Seq100],
  256:                                       [{i,3*I} || I <- Seq100],
  257:                                       list_to_binary(Seq100))),
  258:     {'EXIT',{{bad_generators,{[{i,2}],[{i,7}],<<9:7>>}},_}} =
  259:         catch strict_list_strict_2([{i,1},{i,2}], [{i,2},{i,7}], <<3,9:7>>),
  260:     {'EXIT',{{bad_generators,{[],[],[]}},_}} =
  261:         catch strict_list_strict_2([], [], []),
  262:     {'EXIT',{{bad_generators,{[{i,0}],[],<<>>}},_}} =
  263:         catch strict_list_strict_2([{i,0}], [], <<>>),
  264:     {'EXIT',{{bad_generators,{[{i,0}],[{bad,5}],<<99>>}},_}} =
  265:         catch strict_list_strict_2([{i,0}], [{bad,5}], <<99>>),
  266:     {'EXIT',{{bad_generators,{[{i,20}],[{i,21}],<<42:7>>}},_}} =
  267:         catch strict_list_strict_2([{i,20}], [{i,21}], <<42:7>>),
  268: 
  269:     [] = strict_list_strict_3([], <<>>),
  270:     [45] = strict_list_strict_3([{i,42}], <<3>>),
  271:     {'EXIT',{{bad_generators,{[],<<2>>}},_}} =
  272:         catch strict_list_strict_3([{i,1}], <<1,2>>),
  273:     {'EXIT',{{bad_generators,{[],<<0:7>>}},_}} =
  274:         catch strict_list_strict_3([], <<0:7>>),
  275:     {'EXIT',{{bad_generators,{[{i,1}],<<0:7>>}},_}} =
  276:         catch strict_list_strict_3([{i,1}], <<0:7>>),
  277: 
  278:     [] = strict_list_strict_4([], <<>>),
  279:     [100] = strict_list_strict_4([{i,100}], <<42>>),
  280:     {'EXIT',{{bad_generators,{[{i,100}],<<0>>}},_}} =
  281:         catch strict_list_strict_4([{i,100}], <<0>>),
  282:     {'EXIT',{{bad_generators,{[{i,100}],<<>>}},_}} =
  283:         catch strict_list_strict_4([{i,100}], <<>>),
  284:     {'EXIT',{{bad_generators,{[{i,100}],<<0:8,1:1>>}},_}} =
  285:         catch strict_list_strict_4([{i,100}], <<0:8,1:1>>),
  286: 
  287:     NaN = <<-1:64>>,
  288:     [] = strict_list_5(<<>>, <<>>),
  289:     [3.14] = strict_list_5(<<0:1,1:1>>, <<32,0.0:32/float, 64,3.14:64/float>>),
  290:     [0.0,3.14] = strict_list_5(<<1:1,1:1>>, <<32,0.0:32/float, 64,3.14:64/float>>),
  291:     {'EXIT',{{bad_generators,{<<>>,<<64,42.0/float>>}},_}} =
  292:         catch strict_list_5(<<>>, <<64,42.0/float>>),
  293:     {'EXIT',{{bad_generators,{<<0:1,1:1>>,
  294:                               <<117,-1:117/signed,32,17.0:32/float>>}},_}} =
  295:         catch strict_list_5(<<0:1,1:1>>, <<117,-1:117, 32,17.0:32/float>>),
  296:     {'EXIT',{{bad_generators,{<<0:1>>,<<64,NaN/binary>>}},_}} =
  297:         catch strict_list_5(<<1:1,0:1>>, <<32,42.0:32/float, 64,NaN/binary>>),
  298:     {'EXIT',{{bad_generators,{<<1:1>>,<<64,NaN/binary>>}},_}} =
  299:         catch strict_list_5(<<1:1,1:1>>, <<32,42.0:32/float, 64,NaN/binary>>),
  300: 
  301:     ok.
  302: 
  303: strict_list_mixed_1(X, Y) ->
  304:     [A + B || {i,A} <:- X && {i,B} <- Y].
  305: 
  306: strict_list_mixed_2(L, Map0) ->
  307:     Map = maps:iterator(Map0, ordered),
  308:     [A * B + C || {i,A} <:- L && {k,B} := {v,C} <- Map].
  309: 
  310: strict_list_strict_1(X, Y) ->
  311:     [A + B || {i,A} <:- X && {i,B} <:- Y].
  312: 
  313: strict_list_strict_2(X, Y, Z) ->
  314:     [A * B + C || {i,A} <:- X && {i,B} <:- Y && <<C:8>> <:= Z].
  315: 
  316: strict_list_strict_3(List, Bin) ->
  317:     [A + B || {i,A} <:- List && <<B:8>> <:= Bin].
  318: 
  319: strict_list_strict_4(List, Bin) ->
  320:     [A || {i,A} <:- List && <<42:8>> <:= Bin].
  321: 
  322: strict_list_5(Wanted, Floats) ->
  323:     Res = [F || <<W:1>> <:= Wanted && <<Size:8,F:Size/float>> <:= Floats, W =:= 1],
  324:     Res = [F || <<1:1>> <= Wanted && <<Size:8,F:Size/float>> <:= Floats],
  325:     Res.
  326: 
  327: strict_binary(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  328:     Seq100 = lists:seq(1, 100),
  329: 
  330:     <<2,4,6>> = << <<(X+Y)>> || X <:- [1,2,3] && <<Y>> <= <<1,2,3>>>>,
  331:     <<2,4>> = << <<(X+Y)>> || <<X>> <:= <<1,2,3>> && {X, Y} <- [{1,1},{2,2},{2,3}]>>,
  332:     <<2,24>> = << <<(X*Y*Z)>> || X := Y <:- #{1 => 2, 3 => 4} && <<Z>> <:= <<1,2>> >>,
  333: 
  334:     <<>> = strict_binary_1(#{}, <<>>),
  335:     <<24:64>> = strict_binary_1(#{2 => {val,3}}, <<4:8>>),
  336:     ?assertEqual(<< <<(5*I * 3*I * I):64>> || I <- Seq100 >>,
  337:                  strict_binary_1(maps:iterator(#{5*I => {val,3*I} || I <- Seq100}, ordered),
  338:                                  list_to_binary(Seq100))),
  339:     {'EXIT',{{bad_generators,{none,<<42:8>>}},_}} = catch strict_binary_1(#{}, <<42:8>>),
  340:     {'EXIT',{{bad_generators,{none,<<42:7>>}},_}} = catch strict_binary_1(#{}, <<42:7>>),
  341:     {'EXIT',{{bad_generators,{none,<<0:4>>}},_}} = catch strict_binary_1(#{2 => {val,3}}, <<0,0:4>>),
  342: 
  343:     <<>> = strict_binary_mixed_1(<<>>, #{}, #{}),
  344:     <<>> = strict_binary_mixed_1(<<1:2>>, #{}, #{}),
  345:     <<999:64>> = strict_binary_mixed_1(<<1:1>>, #{0 => {v,0}}, #{1 => {v,999}}),
  346:     ?assertEqual(<< <<I:64>> || I <- Seq100>>,
  347:                  strict_binary_mixed_1(<<0:100>>,
  348:                                        #{I => {v,I} || I <- Seq100},
  349:                                        #{I => {v,-I} || I <- Seq100})),
  350:     ?assertEqual(<< <<-I:64>> || I <- Seq100>>,
  351:                  strict_binary_mixed_1(<<-1:100>>,
  352:                                        #{I => {v,I} || I <- Seq100},
  353:                                        #{I => {v,-I} || I <- Seq100})),
  354:     {'EXIT',{{bad_generators,{<<0:1>>,{0,0,none},{0,{v,7},none}}},_}} =
  355:         catch strict_binary_mixed_1(<<0:1>>, #{0 => 0}, #{0 => {v,7}}),
  356: 
  357:     Island = ~"skärgårdsö",
  358:     IslandSeq = lists:seq(1, length([C || <<C/utf8>> <= Island])),
  359:     ?assertEqual(<< <<I:8,C:32>> ||
  360:                      {I,C} <:- lists:zip(IslandSeq, [C || <<C/utf8>> <= Island]) >>,
  361:                  strict_binary_utf8(IslandSeq, Island)),
  362:     {'EXIT',{{bad_generators,{[4,5,6,7,8],<<16#ff,16#ff,"def">>}},_}} =
  363:         catch strict_binary_utf8(lists:seq(1, 8), <<"abc",16#ff,16#ff,"def">>),
  364: 
  365:     ok.
  366: 
  367: strict_binary_1(Map, Bin) ->
  368:     << <<(X*Y*Z):64>> || X := {val,Y} <:- Map && <<Z:8>> <:= Bin >>.
  369: 
  370: strict_binary_utf8(List, Bin) ->
  371:     << <<I:8,C:32>> || I <:- List && <<C/utf8>> <:= Bin >>.
  372: 
  373: strict_binary_mixed_1(Bin, MapA0, MapB0) ->
  374:     MapA = maps:iterator(MapA0, ordered),
  375:     MapB = maps:iterator(MapB0, ordered),
  376:     <<case N of
  377:           0 -> <<V1:64>>;
  378:           1 -> <<V2:64>>
  379:       end || <<N:1>> <= Bin && _ := {v,V1} <:- MapA && _ := {v,V2} <- MapB>>.
  380: 
  381: nomatch(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  382:     [] = do_nomatch_1([], []),
  383:     [] = do_nomatch_1([1], [a]),
  384:     [] = do_nomatch_1([1,2], [a,b]),
  385:     {'EXIT',{{bad_generators,{[1,2,3],[]}},_}} = do_nomatch_1([1,2,3], []),
  386:     {'EXIT',{{bad_generators,{[3],[]}},_}} = do_nomatch_1([1,2,3], [a,b]),
  387: 
  388:     <<>> = do_nomatch_2([], <<>>),
  389:     <<>> = do_nomatch_2([a], <<1>>),
  390:     {'EXIT',{{bad_generators,{[2],<<>>}},_}} = do_nomatch_2([1,2], <<3>>),
  391:     ok.
  392: 
  393: do_nomatch_1(L1, L2) ->
  394:     catch [{X, Y} || a=b=X <- L1 && Y <- L2].
  395: 
  396: do_nomatch_2(L, Bin) ->
  397:     catch << <<(X+Y)/integer>> || a=b=X <- L && <<Y>> <= Bin >>.
  398: 
  399: bad_generators(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  400:     {'EXIT',{{bad_generators,{x,[1,2]}},_}} =
  401:         catch [{X,Y} || X <- x && Y <- [1,2]],
  402:     {'EXIT',{{bad_generators,{[],[4]}},_}} =
  403:         catch [{X,Y} || X <- [1,2,3] && Y <- [1,2,3,4]],
  404:     {'EXIT',{{bad_generators,{[3,4],[]}},_}} =
  405:         catch [{X,Y} || X <- [1,2,3,4] && Y <- [1,2], X < 3],
  406:     {'EXIT',{{bad_generators,{[3,4],[]}},_}} =
  407:         catch << <<(X+Y)/integer>> || X <- [1,2,3,4] && Y <- [1,2], X < 3>>,
  408:     {'EXIT',{{bad_generators,{<<1,2>>,a}},_}} =
  409:         catch << <<X:16>> || <<X:16>> <= <<1:8,2:8>> && <<X:8>> <= a>>,
  410:     {'EXIT',{{bad_generator,a},_}} = catch [X || X := X <- a && _Y <- [1]],
  411:     {'EXIT',{{bad_generators,{[d],[]}},_}} =
  412:         catch #{X => Y || X <- [a,b,c,d] && Y <- [1,2,3], Y > 1},
  413: 
  414:     %% Make sure that line numbers point out the generator.
  415:     case ?MODULE of
  416:         zlc_inline_SUITE ->
  417:             %% No inline suite for now. Just a guard in case we add it later.
  418:             ok;
  419:         _ ->
  420:             {'EXIT',{{bad_generators,{[],[4]}},
  421:                      [{?MODULE,_,_,
  422:                        [{file,"bad_zlc.erl"},{line,4}]}|_]}} =
  423:                 catch bad_generators([1,2,3],[1,2,3,4]),
  424: 
  425:             {'EXIT',{{bad_generators,{a,[2,3]}},
  426:                      [{?MODULE,_,_,
  427:                        [{file,"bad_zlc.erl"},{line,7}]}|_]}} =
  428:                 catch bad_generators_bc(a,[2,3]),
  429: 
  430:             {'EXIT',{{bad_generators,{[2],[]}},
  431:                      [{?MODULE,_,_,
  432:                        [{file,"bad_zlc.erl"},{line,10}]}|_]}} =
  433:                 catch bad_generators_mc([1,2],[1]),
  434: 
  435:             %% List comprehensions with improper lists.
  436:             {'EXIT',{{bad_generators,{d,[d]}},
  437:                      [{?MODULE,_,_,
  438:                        [{file,"bad_zlc.erl"},{line,4}]}|_]}} =
  439:                 catch bad_generators([a,b,c|d],[a,b,c,d])
  440:     end,
  441:     ok.
  442: 
  443: -file("bad_zlc.erl", 1).
  444: bad_generators(L1,L2) ->                        %Line 2
  445:     [{I1, I2} ||                                %Line 3
  446:         I1 <- L1 && I2 <- L2].                  %Line 4
  447: bad_generators_bc(L1,L2) ->                     %Line 5
  448:     << <<I1:4,I2:4>> ||                         %Line 6
  449:         I1 <- L1 && I2 <- L2>>.                 %Line 7
  450: bad_generators_mc(L1,L2) ->                     %Line 8
  451:     #{I1 => I2 ||                               %Line 9
  452:         I1 <- L1 && I2 <- L2}.                  %Line 10
